categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Deddo was a Chiss male agent of Imperial Intelligence during the Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. He was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock.
He was later removed as a vendor and NPC in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
